titleStmt.title: Insectorum sive minimorum animalium theatrum olim ab Edoardo Wottono, Conrado Gesnero, Thomaque Pennio inchoatum ; tandem Tho. Movfeti Londinâtis operâ sumptibusq́[ue] maximis concinnatum, auctum, perfectum ; et ad vivum expressis iconibus suprà quingentis illustratum.
titleStmt.author: Moffett, Thomas, 1553-1604.
Wotton, Edward, 1492-1555.
Gesner, Konrad, 1516-1565.
Penny, Thomas, d. 1589.
Mayerne, Théodore Turquet de, Sir, 1573-1655.

notesStmt.note: Error in paging: 286-295 omitted in number only.
Edited by Sir Théodore Turquet de Mayerne.
